document_data.caption: The Everlund Pass, between Everlund and Silverymoon.
document_data.name: Everlund Pass
document_data.mainbody: The '''Everlund Pass''' was the road from [[Everlund]] to [[Silverymoon]], which crossed the western end of the [[Nether Mountains]].
document_data.Notable Locations: A little over half-way between Everlund and Silverymoon was the [[Moonwyvern Inn]], a cozy place that didn't ask too many questions.{{Cite dragon/288/Elminster's Guide to the Realms: The Moonwyvern Inn|74}}
document_data.Inhabitants:
Many monsters roamed the area surrounding the valley, but patrols from Silverymoon and Everlund ''mostly'' kept the path clear.

[[Clarshee Taraghe]] was the proprietress of the Moonwyvern Inn as of the [[1372 DR|Year of Wild Magic, 1372 DR]].
